title: Tether Gold (XAU₮) Enables Historic First-Ever Gold Dividend Distribution by a Public Gold Company
content: Tether today announced that Tether Gold (XAU₮) is marking a historic milestone for the gold industry: the first-ever publicly listed gold company offering shareholders the option to receive dividends in tokenized gold. Elemental Royalty Corporation, […]
date: Elemental Royalty Corporation becomes the first gold company globally to offer shareholder dividends payable in XAU₮ 17 February 2026  –
